# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This item holds immense significance to me, but I believe it could also be a perfect fit for someone like you who appreciates its true worth. I am offering you the chance to own this product at a special introductory price of $1200000. This is an exceptional value considering the quality and rarity of the item. I trust that you will find its attributes equally compelling. If you're interested in discussing further details or arranging a viewing, please let me know. I look forward to the possibility of facilitating this transaction with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,200,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
